author: Josh Noel
comment: This is by far one of my favorite watch faces. I've been using it for the last couple months and have had no problems with it.
title: Amazing

author: greg kobey
comment: The weather circle just says "no data".. Send a fix or help me fix the weather circle

reply.author: Alex Mullis
reply.content: Hello, the weather will show up soon. The watch face uses an API that updates the weather every hour, every once in a while it doesn't get any data back from the weather service. Just be patient and the weather will load. Sorry for the inconvenience.
